statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, product_catalog FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email_address, product_catalog->'categories' as categories FROM suppliers WHERE product_catalog->'categories' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_id, contact_person, COUNT(*) as num_products FROM suppliers GROUP BY supplier_id, contact_person HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_phone FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number, email_address FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_date, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, s.supplier_name FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, s.supplier_name, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM orders o JOIN suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 5;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM suppliers s JOIN orders o ON s.supplier_id = o.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_orders > 10 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM Products
SELECT * FROM Orders

SELECT product_name, supplier_id, price FROM Products

SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, email_address FROM Suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT supplier_name, street_address, city, state, postal_code FROM Suppliers JOIN Addresses ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Addresses.supplier_id

SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, city, state, zip_code FROM Suppliers JOIN Addresses ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Addresses.supplier_id WHERE state = 'California';
